question:
Match the columns:
(A) Upanishads (1) World’s oldest scriptures  
(B) Samaveda (2) Magical chants  
(C) Rigveda (3) Mysterious doctrine  
(D) Atharvaveda (4) Ritual juice  
     A B C D
explanation:
Upanishads - Mysterious doctrine
Samaveda - Ritual juice
Rig-Veda - World’s oldest scriptures
Atharvaveda- Magical chants
